short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you know if your active tab has a humans.txt

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
“Made by Humans”

This extension lets you know if your current tab has a humans.txt with a little human icon. Clicking the icon will show you the file (if it exits). Why should you care? Because websites take a lot of teamwork, tools, and luck to pull together. Also - sometimes they have easter eggs and secret job postings ;).

Learn more at humanstxt.org
